data.prayer: Father, let those from the 108 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Čair, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Čair, North Macedonia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 599 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Čair do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Čair, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Albanian, Macedonian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please give the church in the state of Čair prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 108 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 108 believers in the state of Čair the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
